text: Matthew Scott (1867 – 1897) was an English professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1867 births Category:1897 deaths Category:People from Newcastle upon Tyne Category:English footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Elswick Rangers F.C. players Category:Newcastle East End F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Newcastle United F.C. players Category:South Shields F.C. title: Matthew Scott (footballer, born 1867)
